question:
You recently went to the cinema and think that you left something that belongs to you there. Write a letter to the cinema manager. In your letter

say when you were at the cinema and which film you sawdescribe what item you have lost and where you think you left ittell the manager what you want him/her to do
text: I am writing this letter in connection with an item that I might have lost during my previous visit to your cinema.

Stating with the day that I was there, which is last Thursday, November 18. I went there with a couple of friends to watch the new Matrix movie, in the 20:30 hours section. We watched in screen room 6, but I am not precisely sure about our seats.

With regards to the item that I lost, it is a small bag containing basically two math books and many notes from my university classes. Although these items might not be of much value to others, they are extremely important to my final exams.

Finally, I would like to kindly ask if you could keep my personal belongings until I can go to the cinema next week. If you agree, I would like also to ask you to send me a letter providing the staff name of whom I could speak to get the item back.
I am looking forward to a response at your earliest convenience.
